ygData.subject: RE: What about the lvl 24 song?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That s not my experience.  This weekend, in Kedge, I used Sonorous Clouding to see someone who was invis, but not in my party. Elwe Lay 37 Songs Kinship of
ygData.messageBody:
> I keep hearing this and hopefully this will make you all realize that the
> see invis song is still useful. Clouding only gives party see invis. In
> other words, the only invis you can see are the members of your party that
> you have invissed. You do not see all invisible creatures and players, only
> those in your party.


That's not my experience. This weekend, in Kedge, I used Sonorous Clouding
to see someone who was invis, but not in my party.


Elwe Lay
37 Songs
Kinship of Valor
Karana
